mapper.select: SELECT s.*, m.fresh_time, m.expires_in FROM shigu_shop s, taobao_session_map m WHERE s.tb_nick = m.nick AND s.shop_id = #{shopId} ORDER BY m.fresh_time DESC limit 1

SELECT s.*,l.context as shop_tags_contexts FROM shigu_shop s left join ( select * from shigu_shop_license l where l.license_type = 5 and l.license_failure = 0 ) l on s.shop_id = l.shop_id WHERE s.shop_status = 0 AND s.display_in_market = 1 AND s.floor_id = #{floorId}

SELECT s.*,l.context as shop_tags_contexts FROM shigu_shop s left join ( select * from shigu_shop_license l where l.license_type = 5 and l.license_failure = 0 ) l on s.shop_id = l.shop_id WHERE s.shop_id in
#{item}

SELECT shop_id FROM shigu_shop WHERE 1 = 1
and lower(domain) = lower(#{domain})
and shop_id != #{shopId}
and lower(shop_num) = lower(#{shopNum})
select store_id from shigu_store_num_show where store_num_id=${storeNumId}
